thread.title: Gionee Elife E8 launched in India exclusively via Snapdeal, priced at Rs 34,999: Specifications, features
thread.title_full: Gionee Elife E8 launched in India exclusively via Snapdeal, priced at Rs 34,999: Specifications, features - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Gionee Elife E8 launched in India exclusively via Snapdeal, priced at Rs 34,999: Specifications, features
text: As expected, Gionee today finally launched the Elife E8 in India. The flagship smartphone is priced at Rs 34,999, and as hinted in the company’s invite, this is the first Gionee smartphone to be exclusively available online, via Snapdeal. It will go on sale next week on October 12. Gionee had launched the Elife E8 in China nearly four months back. The talking points of the smartphone are not only its premium design, but also its photography chops. At the back, the smartphone boasts a 21-megapixel camera with True Tone LED flash, lossless zoom, phase detection autofocus (which can focus in 0.08-0.2 seconds), and 4K video recording capabilities.
